official_title: A bill to amend the United States Synthetic Fuels Corporation Act to support synthetic fuel research and development.

summary.text: Amends the United States Synthetic Fuels Corporation Act to require that preference in selecting proposals for synthetic fuels projects for financial assistance be given to proposals for synthetic fuel research and development which represent the least commitment of financial assistance by the U.S. Synthetic Fuels Corporation and the lowest unit production cost within a given technological process.

titles.title: A bill to amend the United States Synthetic Fuels Corporation Act to support synthetic fuel research and development.
